name: checker-framework-vscode
description: LSP client for the EISOP Checker Framework
author: eisopux

checker-framework.checkers.description: List of checkers enabled for compilation. More details in: https://eisop.github.io/cf/manual/manual.html#running

checker-framework.frameworkPath.description: Absolute path of the Checker Framework.

checker-framework.languageServerPath.description: Absolute path to the fat jar of the Checker Framework language server.

checker-framework.commandLineOptions.description: List of command-line options to pass to javac. See available options: https://github.com/eisopux/checker-framework-vscode#commandlineoptions

checker-framework.checkerframework_org.description: From which Github organization to download the Checker Framework.

checker-framework.checkerframework_repo.description: From which Github repository under checkerframework_org to download the Checker Framework.

checker-framework.languageserver_org.description: From which Github organization to download the language server.

checker-framework.languageserver_repo.description: From which Github repository under languageserver_org to download the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run get-downloader-release
